abstract: Stock fall globally due to steep drop in Chinese market.
lead_paragraph: U.S. stocks were broadly down after the market in Shanghai experienced the biggest one-day decline in Chinese stocks since 2007.

headline.main: Losing Streak Continues After a Slide in China’s Markets
headline.print_headline: Global Markets Tilt Like Dominoes, Set in Motion by a Chinese Sell-Off

snippet: U.S. stocks were broadly down after the market in Shanghai experienced the biggest one-day decline in Chinese stocks since 2007.
